TEST.0.title: 2024 North Carolina Division C Regional 3
TEST.0.customHeader:
Names of participants: (Please print neatly)

 
 
 
School Name:

Check your team:  ◻ Varsity     ◻ JV1      JV2     ◻ JV3

Warning: Do not open this packet until given permission to do so.

Note: There are useful notes after this page.

CIPHER.41.cipherString: The successful entrepreneur manages to strike the right balance between preservation and renewal.
CIPHER.41.question: A quote by Sandy Pfund has been encoded as an Aristocrat for you to decode.  What did they say?
CIPHER.41.author: Sandy Pfund

CIPHER.42.cipherString: Science must have originated in the feeling of something being wrong.
CIPHER.42.question: The following quote by Thomas Carlyle needs to be decoded with the Nihilist Substitition Cipher with a keyword of WORK and polybius key of FORMULATE.
CIPHER.42.author: Thomas Carlyle

CIPHER.43.cipherString: Friendship is the only thing in the world concerning the usefulness of which all mankind are agreed.
CIPHER.43.question: A quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero has been encoded as an Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode. You are told that the letter C decodes to be T.
CIPHER.43.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

CIPHER.44.question: The following cryptarithm provides the key to decoding the values 7415 3415639 . What do they decode to?

CIPHER.147.cipherString: There are a lot of things I wish I would have done, instead of just sitting around and complaining about having a boring life.
CIPHER.147.question: A quote by Kurt Cobain has been encoded using the K1 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode. You are told that the letter D decodes to be E.
CIPHER.147.author: Kurt Cobain

CIPHER.48.cipherString: People that have nothing to do are quickly tired of their own company.
CIPHER.48.question: The following quote by J. Collier needs to be decoded with the Porta Cipher with a keyword of LAZY
CIPHER.48.author: J. Collier

CIPHER.60.cipherString: It takes a good many spadefuls of earth to bury the truth.
CIPHER.60.question: A German Proverb has been encoded as a Complete Columnar Cipher.  You are told that it decodes to include the text A GOOD M in it.  What is the full proverb?
CIPHER.60.author: German Proverb

CIPHER.58.question: The following cryptarithm provides the key to decoding the values 52883 9731 47489 . What do they decode to?

CIPHER.61.cipherString: If you can show people how to build castles, make sure you do not neglect building and nurturing your own.
CIPHER.61.question: A quote by Suzy Kassem has been encoded using the K1 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode. You are told that the letter H maps to O.
CIPHER.61.author: Suzy Kassem

CIPHER.57.cipherString: Whenever I find the key to success, someone changes the lock.
CIPHER.57.question: The following symbols are a Baconian cipher of a quote found on the internet.  What do they decode to?
CIPHER.57.author: Unknown

CIPHER.47.cipherString: Spede is nut alwaze a constituent two grate werk, teh process uv creashun should bee give in time and thought.
CIPHER.47.question: A friend who can't type or spell very well has encoded a quote by Hosea Ballou as an Aristocrat encoded with a K1 keyword.  What does it decode to?
CIPHER.47.author: Hosea Ballou

CIPHER.50.cipherString: There are more microbes per person than the entire population of the world.
CIPHER.50.question: The following quote by Alan Bennett needs to be decoded with the Nihilist Substitition Cipher with a keyword of NAME and polybius key of PSEUDONYM.
CIPHER.50.author: Alan Bennett

CIPHER.59.cipherString: Si tienes la suerte de encontrar una forma de vida que te guste, tienes que encontrar el coraje para vivirla.
CIPHER.59.question: A quote by John Irving has been translated into Spanish and encoded as an Aristocrat using a English K1 keyword.  What does it decode to?
CIPHER.59.author: John Irving
CIPHER.59.translation: If you are lucky enough to find a way of life you love, you have to find the courage to live it.

CIPHER.53.cipherString: Everything changes in my life, and the world stays the same.
CIPHER.53.question: A quote by Cassandra Clare has been encoded using the Fractionated Morse Cipher for you to decode. You are told that the quote starts with EVER.
CIPHER.53.author: Cassandra Clare

CIPHER.54.cipherString: I've never been very good at geography. But I can name at least one city in France, which is Nice.
CIPHER.54.question: A quote has been encoded using the K1 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode. You are told that the letter G decodes to T.
CIPHER.54.author: Unknown

CIPHER.51.cipherString: There are moments on stage when everything comes together. Then the kid in the front row coughs.
CIPHER.51.question: The following quote by Connie Brockway has been encoded as Complete Columnar cipher.  You are told that the word STAGE appears in the decoded text.
CIPHER.51.author: Connie Brockway

CIPHER.52.cipherString: You can see it, but it's not really there. Just like the end of a rainbow, the horizon is an illusion.
CIPHER.52.question: A quote by Holly Ringland has been encoded using the K2 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode. You are told that the letter N decodes to O.
CIPHER.52.author: Holly Ringland

CIPHER.55.cipherString: When do people start using their trampoline? Spring-Time.
CIPHER.55.question: The following symbols are a Baconian Cipher of a question.  What do they decode to?
CIPHER.55.author: Unknown

CIPHER.56.cipherString: Boredom is the fear of self.
CIPHER.56.question: Decode the following quote by Marie Josephine Suin De Beausacq which was encoded as a 2x2 Hill Cipher using a keyword of LION.
CIPHER.56.author: Marie Josephine Suin De Beausacq

CIPHER.49.cipherString: One of the most rewarding things that you can do in life is to help someone unconditionally.
CIPHER.49.question: A quote by Jason Langella has been encoded as an Aristocrat using a K3 key phrase.  What was the key phrase used to encode the Cipher?
CIPHER.49.author: Jason Langella

CIPHER.46.cipherString: He that seeks to have many friends never has any.
CIPHER.46.question: The following strange headlines encode a quote by Italian Proverb using a Baconian cipher. You are told that the deciphered text starts with HE TH
CIPHER.46.author: Italian Proverb
